participant_1.background:
My sweet tooth loves gummy worms.
I am afraid of losing my friends because they are the most important people in my life.
i paint with watercolors.
I enjoy reading with my daughter and getting lost in other worlds.
I get to share my love of animals and storytelling with others.

participant_2.background:
I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year.
I like to keep my home clean and tidy, but I also have a wild side and enjoy trying new things like auditioning for a talent show.
I love growing sunflowers
i am bald with a thick beard.
I play the piano to help my siblings relax.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Not much today, just hanging out. What about you?
I'm getting ready to paint with watercolors. I love painting.
Cool, what are you going to paint?
I'm not sure yet, I might paint a picture of my daughter.
That sounds like a great idea. I love painting pictures of my daughters too.
I'm also afraid of losing my friends, because they are the most important people in my life.
I can understand that. I'm also afraid of losing my family and friends.
I'm glad to hear that. We're all in this together.
Yes, we are. We should keep in touch.
That sounds like a great idea.
